required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

lead_sponsor.agency: Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

clinical_study.source: Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

oversight_info.authority: China: Ministry of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: This double-blind and double-dummy RCT will evaluate the therapeutic effectiveness and safety of auricular acupuncture(AA) for primary insomnia(PI) .

detailed_description.textblock: Investigators will conduct a 2-year clinical trial on auricular acupuncture (AA) for primary insomnia (PI), which is a double-blind ( patient-blind and assessor-blind) and double-dummy RCT. 288 patients will be randomly assigned into 2 groups: the treatment group (Group A) and the control group (Group B). Group A will be treated with AA pressure plus oral placebo, while Group B will be treated with sham AA pressure plus oral Eszopiclone. All patients will receive a continuous 4-week treatment and 28-week follow-up. The data will be analyzed by the third party who is not clear about allocation and treatment.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline in SOL at 4 weeks
primary_outcome.description: SOL is one of the sleep parameters mainly measured by actigraphy and sleep diaries, referring to the time it takes to fall asleep, starting from the moment of having intention to fall asleep, stopping at the moment of getting a 5-minute continuous sleep.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline in PSQI at 4 weeks
Change from baseline in ISI at 4 weeks
Change from baseline in BDI at 4 weeks
Change from baseline in STAI at 4 weeks
Change from baseline in SAS at 4 weeks
Change from baseline in ESS at 4 weeks
Change from baseline in FFS at 4 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: The MOS 36-Item Short-Form Health Survey questionnaire (SF-36)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline in SF-36 at 4 weeks
Change from baseline in TST at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: TST is one of the sleep parameters mainly measured by actigraphy and sleep diaries, referring to actually time slept, it's the amount of time from the initial sleep to final awakening, excluding the awake time.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline in SE at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: SE is one of the sleep parameters mainly measured by actigraphy and sleep diaries, sleep efficiency percentage = [total sleep time/total time in bed] ×100%.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline in WASO at 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: WASO is one of the sleep parameters mainly measured by actigraphy and sleep diaries, referring to the total time of awakening which from the initial sleep onset to the last awakening.

arm_group.description: vaccaria seed will be chosen as auricular acupuncture material to attach every 3 days for 28 days, meanwhile, oral placebo will be applied 15 mins before going to sleep everyday for 28 days.
Acupoints without certain effect for primary insomnia will be chosen to attach every 3 days for 28 days, meanwhile, Eszopiclone will be applied 15 mins before going to sleep everyday for 28 days.

intervention.description: Auricular acupoints: Shenmen (TF4), Heart (CO15), Subcortex (AT4), modifying points according to different patterns. Auricular attachment material: vaccaria seed. Vaccaria seed manufacturer: Taicheng science and technology development limited company, Shanghai. Production license: Shanghai Food and Drug Administration production permit NO.20041117. Treatment frequency: every 3 days. Duration: 28 days.

Auricular acupoints: Wrist (SF1), Clavicle (SF6), Shoulder (SF4、5), Tooth (LO1), Tonsil (LO7, 8, 9), modifying points according to different patterns. Auricular attachment material: vaccaria seed. Vaccaria seed manufacturer: Taicheng science and technology development limited company, Shanghai. Production license: Shanghai Food and Drug Administration production permit NO.20041117. Treatment frequency: every 3 days. Duration: 28 days

Dosage form: tablet. Dosage: 1 piece (3mg). Drug manufacturer: Kanghong pharmaceutical limited liability company, Chengdu. Production license: NO. H20100074 approved by the state. Treatment frequency: 15 mins before going to bed everyday. Duration: 28days

The dosage form (shape, color, size) and dosage of placebo is similar to Eszopiclone. Placebo manufacturer: Kanghong pharmaceutical limited liability company, Chengdu. Treatment frequency: 15 mins before going to bed everyday. Duration: 28days.
